articles.title: Delegation of Federation of Koreans in Australia Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Federation of Koreans in Australia Leaves
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Federation of Koreans in Australia led by Chairman Pak Yong Ha left here on Wednesday.

articles.title: Officials in Field of Forest Restoration and Land and Environment Protection Meet
articles.content:
Officials in Field of Forest Restoration and Land and Environment Protection Meet
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- A meeting of officials in the field of forest restoration and land and environment protection was held at the People's Palace of Culture on Wednesday.
					 Attending it were Premier Pak Pong Ju, member of the Presidium of the Political Bureau of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea and vice-chairman of the State Affairs Commission of the DPRK, O Su Yong and other senior party and government officials, officials of ministries and national institutions and provincial, city and county party and power organs, officials in the field of forest restoration and land and environment protection and those concerned.
					
					 Also present were Pak Yong Sik and other officials of the armed forces organs.
					
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed the results in carrying out the first-phase tasks for the forest restoration campaign and the successes and lessons gained in last year's general mobilization for land management, and discussed measures for achieving greater success in the work for this year.
					
					 The participants watched a multimedia dealing with the performance of the first-phase tasks for the forest restoration campaign and last year's general mobilization for land management.
					
					 Introduced there were the achievements made in sprucing up streets and villages as required by a highly civilized socialist country and protecting the marine resources and cultural heritages of the nation.
					
					 The meeting analyzed and reviewed deviations manifested in the forest restoration campaign and the general mobilization for land management.

articles.title: Multi-purpose Traction Appliance, Mass Medical Instrument
articles.content:
Multi-purpose Traction Appliance, Mass Medical Instrument
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Various kinds of medical appliances have been developed in the public health sector of the DPRK and widely used for the treatment of patients.
					 Among them is a multi-purpose traction appliance developed by the Railway Ministry Hospital.
					
					 The traction appliance, quite different from previous ones in traction method, is a new kind of medical appliance which treats spinal diseases, including slipped disk, and fracture and dislocation of the limbs.
					
					 It overcame the shortcomings of the previous spinal tractors by making the direction of traction and the spinal almost parallel. In case of long bone's fraction, it ensures the accuracy of treatment with the help of x-ray.
					
					 As it is easy to make and convenient for use, the traction appliance is popular among ordinary people, to say nothing of the experts and doctors.

articles.title: World-famous Korean Silk
articles.content:
World-famous Korean Silk
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Korean silk with a long history is well known to the world for its lightness, hardwearing nature, softness and beautiful patterns. Silk is a natural fiber woven of cocoon thread.
					 Korea began to produce silk from ancient times together with hemp cloth and ramie cloth. In the periods of the Three Kingdoms (early 3rd century B.C.-middle 7th century A.D.), more than ten kinds of silks came into being with brisk silkworm-raising in the whole areas and their colors and patterns were diversified to be spread to a neighboring country. 
					
					 The silk-weaving technology was further developed in the period of Koryo Kingdom (918-1392) and silks were called "Koryo silks" for their quality and beauty.
					
					 During the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910) silk producers appeared in areas where many mulberries grew and water was good. Famous were silks produced in Nyongbyon and Songchon of Phyongan Province, Kumya, Jongphyong, Kowon and Riwon of Hamgyong Province, Cholwon of Kangwon Province, Suan of Hwanghae Province, etc. 
					
					 Oaju (white silk like fish tooth) and Johaju (beautiful silk like morning glow) found their way to foreign markets.
					
					 Silks fresh in summer and warm in winter were used for quality cloths for bounce and softness. 
					
					 The silk production is increasing in the DPRK under the leadership of the Workers' Party of Korea, contributing to improving the people's standard of living.
					
					 Recently, the Nyongbyon Silk Mill and other silk production bases are producing quality silks suited to the tastes of the people by introducing a new silk-weaving method, and quilts, ramie cloths and other new silk goods are enjoying popularity at public service amenities.
					
					 Meanwhile, the silk-weaving technology has been registered as one of national intangible heritages in the country.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Nuclear Criminal State
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Brands U.S. as Nuclear Criminal State
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Some days ago, the U.S. released a 2018 nuclear posture review.
					 The review is peppered with warlike logic and aggression scenarios aimed to further increase and modernize all types of nuclear hardware and mount preemptive nuclear attacks on other countries any moment.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article that the U.S. betrayed once again its scheme to control other countries and nations and dominate the world with nukes.
					
					 Citing the facts to expose that the U.S. is the very one which  sparked a nuclear arms race on the earth and spawned threat of a nuclear war by making nuclear weapons for the first time in history, the article goes on:
					
					 The U.S. is the worst nuclear criminal state as it has stockpiled all types of nuclear hardware as much as possible, driving the world into a nuclear war.
					
					 As long as the U.S. exists on the earth, the nuclear threat to mankind will steadily increase and the high-handedness and war moves based on the nuclear edge will get ever more pronounced.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nukes and build-up of the nuclear force is a just self-defensive measure to cope with the increasing nuclear threat and blackmail of the U.S. Peace and security of the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world are guaranteed by the DPRK's increasing nuclear force.
					
					 The U.S. imperialists' more desperate efforts based on nuclear stick against our state convince us that our choice was quite right, and so we will go all out for implementing the line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear forces.

articles.title: Minju Joson Denounces U.S. War Outbursts
articles.content:
Minju Joson Denounces U.S. War Outbursts
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- The Trump group recently built up public opinion that if the "north Korea's nuclear issue" is not settled in a diplomatic way, it can not but take a military option. Trump, an old lunatic ignorant of military affairs, betrayed his intention to settle the issue in a military way on several occasions and his aides, echoing his remarks, said that if the diplomatic method fails, there is no other way but a military option and that they will pull the trigger for a military action.
					 In this regard, Minju Joson Wednesday in a commentary says:
					
					 It is nothing but a foolish jargon of those who try to flee from the blame for the failure of policy towards the DPRK and get rid of international denunciation of them.
					
					 The Trump group trumpets about the possibility of military option in an attempt to get justification beforehand for an adventurous preemptive attack in an extreme case.
					
					 But the choice of the U.S. mulling over military method is a pipedream. Although others may yield to the war hysteria, the DPRK is a world-level military power which remains unperturbed in the face of such bluff. Clear is that the Trump group is a herd of stupid and foolish idiots as they get frantic, unaware of the faith and will and pluck of Juche Korea.
					
					 The aggressors and provokers who try to invade the DPRK will be unable to escape a resolute punishment by the Korean army and people anytime and anywhere.
					
					 The Trump group should clearly understand its rival and think twice rather than making a show-off with warlike reckless remarks precipitating the destruction of the U.S. mainland.

articles.title: Minju Joson on Impertinent Interference of Outsiders
articles.content:
Minju Joson on Impertinent Interference of Outsiders
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- It is an inviolable right of the Korean nation to use the Korean Peninsula flag in which Tok Islets are marked, says Minju Joson in a commentary Wednesday.
					 It goes on:
					
					 But the International Olympic Committee (IOC) turned down the DPRK's principled demand to the last under the unreasonable pretext.
					
					 IOC's act does not conform to the mission of the international Olympic games for peace and international concord. Worse still, it is an unpardonable mockery and insult to the sovereignty and dignity of the Korean nation.
					
					 Behind the IOC' act were the Japanese reactionaries.
					
					 The Japanese reactionaries have left no stone unturned to block the use of the Korean Peninsula flag with Tok Islets marked. It is because their plan to pave the way for realizing a militaristic ambition will be futile if the tension on the Korean Peninsula is eased.
					
					 What matters is an attitude of the south side which does not properly counter the wicked moves of the IOC and Japan. Its behavior gives disappointment to all Koreans as it has to read the face of Japan, a political dwarf, contrary to its oft-repeated "claims to Tok Islets".
					
					 No one defends or presents the sovereignty and dignity of the nation.
					
					 The south side should come to its senses, raise its voice for defending the sovereignty and dignity of the nation and categorically reject the foreign forces' imprudent interference in the above-said issue.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Nepal
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Praised in Nepal
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Nepalese political party and body issued statements on Feb. 8 and 10 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The United Socialist Nationalist Party of Nepal said in its statement:
					
					 We pay the highest tribute to the great leader Comrade Kim Jong Il, the eternal head of the Workers' Party of Korea, on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					
					 He is a prominent leader who developed in depth President Kim Il Sung's Juche idea into the guiding idea in the era of independence and performed undying feats in accomplishing the human cause of independence.
					
					 He is a great guardian as he not only protected socialism in Korea, but also led the socialist cause of the world to revival and new upswing from collapse and frustration in the worst difficulties and trials towards the close of the last century.
					
					 His distinguished feats in turning the DPRK into a political and military power and a nuclear weapons state will remain long in the human history.
					
					 The Nepal Journalist Association said that thanks to the original Songun politics enforced by Kim Jong Il, the Korean revolution could advance along the road of victory and glory, adding that he would always be remembered by the Korean people and the world progressives for his exploits for the times and history.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Printed in Bangladesh
Pyongyang, February 21 (KCNA) -- Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Concluding Speech at the March 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea" was brought out in booklet at a Bangladeshi publishing house on Feb. 2 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il, the Day of the Shining Star.
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 102 (2013), deals with the validity of the new strategic line of simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and the building of nuclear forces set forth by the WPK and why the Party adopted this line.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de criminal nuclear que amenaza el planeta
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun califica a EE.UU. de criminal nuclear que amenaza el planeta
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Hace poco, EE.UU. publico el reporte de revision del estado nuclear 2018.
					Este documento esta lleno de la logica belicosa y planes de agresion destinados a aumentar y modernizar los mortiferos pertrechos nucleares de varios tipos y asestar el ataque preventivo nuclear contra otros paises en cualquier momento.
					
					De esa manera, EE.UU. volvio a exponer abiertamente su intento de reprimir a otros paises y naciones y dominar el mundo con esas armas de exterminio masivo.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual difundido este miercoles y prosigue:
					
					EE.UU. es el fautor que causo la carrera armamentista nuclear y la amenaza de guerra nuclear al fabricar el artefacto de destruccion masiva por primera vez en la historia.
					
					Igualmente, es el peor Estado criminal que lleva el mundo al umbral de guerra nuclear manteniendo un monton de armas nucleares de todo tipo.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. exista en la Tierra, se tornara mas grave la amenaza nuclear contra la humanidad e iran de mal en peor sus acciones arbitrarias y belicas, basadas en la superioridad nuclear.
					
					La posesion y el incremento de armas nucleares de la RPDC devienen las justas medidas autodefensivas frente a la escalada de amenaza y chantaje nucleares de EE.UU.
					
					En ellas estan la garantia de paz y seguridad de la Peninsula Coreana y el resto del mundo.
					
					Mientras EE.UU. se ponga mas feroz contra la RPDC levantando el garrote nuclear, la segunda redoblara los esfuerzos por implementar su linea de impulsar simultaneamente la construccion economica y la de fuerzas armadas nucleares sintiendose mas convencida de la justeza de su opcion.

articles.title: Minju Joson rechaza intervencion extranjera en el uso de bandera de reunificacion
articles.content:
Minju Joson rechaza intervencion extranjera en el uso de bandera de reunificacion
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- Emplear la bandera de reunificacion con el islote Tok marcado es el derecho inalienable de la nacion coreana.
					Sin embargo, el Comite Olimpico Internacional (COI) no acepto hasta el final la demanda de principios de la RPDC sobre el uso de esa bandera presentando pretextos injustos. 
					
					Asi condena el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 21 y continua:
					
					La conducta negativa del COI no conviene a la mision de los Juegos Olimpicos en aras de la paz y la armonia internacional siendo imperdonable burla e insulto a la soberania y dignidad de la nacion coreana.
					
					Por supuesto, detras de la cortina, estuvo la mano de los reaccionarios japoneses. 
					
					Ellos obstaculizan por todos los medios el uso de la bandera de reunificacion con el islote Tok anotado porque tienen miedo a que resulte fracasado su plan de sentar la base para realizar su ambicion militarista si se alivia la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Lo problematico es la actitud de la parte surcoreana que no reacciona debidamente a la conducta taimada del COI y los tipejos japoneses. Por una parte, reclama el "derecho a la posesion de la isla Tok" y por otra parte, anda acorde al estado de humor de los reaccionarios japoneses que no pasan de ser enanos en lo politico. Esta actitud de la parte surcoreana pone muy decepcionada a la nacion coreana.
					
					La soberania y la dignidad de la nacion no las defienden ni las regalan otros paises.
					
					La parte Sur debe hablar con criterio propio para defender la soberania y la dignidad de la nacion y rechazar tajantemente la intervencion extranjera en el tema de uso de la bandera arriba referida.

articles.title: Minju Joson revela intento de EE.UU. de preparar pretexto de agresion a RPDC
articles.content:
Minju Joson revela intento de EE.UU. de preparar pretexto de agresion a RPDC
Pyongyang, 21 de febrero (ACNC) -- En estos dias, los compinches de Trump divulgan una opinion publica de que no les queda otra alternativa que tomar la opcion militar en el caso de que el "problema nuclear del Norte" no se resuelve por via diplomatica. 
					El demente viejo Trump, muy ignorante de los asuntos castrenses, demostro abiertamente en varias ocasiones la ambicion de solucionar el "problema nuclear norcoreano" de manera militar. En tanto, sus compinches insisten en que "tomaran la opcion militar si saldra fracasado el metodo de resolucion diplomatica" y "apretaran el gatillo de la accion militar".
					
					La bravura de los compinches de Trump no pasa de ser un disparate para evitar la responsabilidad del fracaso de la politica sobre la RPDC y eludir las censuras internacionales.
					
					Asi revela el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado el dia 21 y continua:
					
					La insistencia de la camarilla de Trump en la posibilidad de tomar la opcion militar parte de su idea de preparar de antemano el pretexto para asestar el aventurero ataque preventivo en el caso extremado.
					
					Pero, la opcion militar del pais norteamericano resulta una ilusion irrealizable. 
					
					Quizas saldria con la suya en otros paises la bravura belicosa de la banda de Trump, pero no en la RPDC, potencia militar de talla mundial.
					
					Es lamentable el que todavia, la camarilla de Trump no se da cuenta de la conviccion, voluntad y coraje de la Corea del Juche.
					
					El ejercito y el pueblo coreanos castigaran implacablemente a los agresores que se atreven a agredir a la RPDC.
					
					La banda de Trump no debe soltar las imprudentes locuras belicosas que adelantaran el arruinamiento del territorio estadounidense, sino actuar con prudencia y control al distinguir correctamente a su rival.
